business_address.address_line1: Voltas House-A, Dr Babasaheb Ambedkar Road,

description.desc_thousand_char: Voltas Limited (VL), as per the credit rating report, operates in three main business segmentsâ€”UPBG, EMPS, and EPBG. The UPBG business markets ACs, air coolers, water coolers and other commercial refrigeration products and is also present in the market of centralised air-conditioning and refrigeration. The EMPS business provides engineering solutions for MEP projects, HVAC applications, water management services, and electrification and solar jobs in domestic and overseas markets. The EPBG business markets and trades in mining and construction equipment as well as textile machinery, besides providing after-sales services. It is a part of the Tata Group. The company trades products under the brand name 'Voltas'. Its stores are located in Nashik, Palghar, Thane, and Ahmedabad.
